titleStmt.title: A true account of a letter sent from Vienna, August the 23rd 1683 declaring the rasing the seige and the total overthrow of all the Turkish army / sent in a letter from an eminent English officer under the Duke of Lorraine, to his father at White-Hall.
titleStmt.author: W. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
